title: Symmetry
extract: Symmetry in everyday language refers to a sense of harmonious and beautiful proportion and balance. In mathematics, "symmetry" has a more precise definition, that an object is invariant to any of various transformations; including reflection, rotation or scaling. Although these two meanings of "symmetry" can sometimes be told apart, they are related, so in this article they are discussed together.
extract_html: Symmetry in everyday language refers to a sense of harmonious and beautiful proportion and balance. Although these two meanings of "symmetry" can sometimes be told apart, they are related, so in this article they are discussed together.
